properties.name: emailer.from
properties.description: Email address to use as sender (FROM field) for outgoing emails.

properties.name: emailer.password
properties.description: Password or app password for email authentication.

properties.name: emailer.server.address
properties.description: SMTP server address for sending emails (e.g., smtp.gmail.com).

properties.name: emailer.server.port
properties.description: SMTP server port (typically 587 for TLS or 465 for SSL).

properties.name: app.auth.universal-password-hash
properties.description: BCrypt hash of the universal password for authentication. Can be overridden via UNIVERSAL_PASSWORD_HASH environment variable.

properties.name: app.jwt.refresh-ttl-days
properties.description: Number of days until refresh token expires.

properties.name: app.jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret key for JWT token signing.

properties.name: app.storage.baseDir
properties.description: Base directory for file storage.

properties.name: app.storage.templates.TENANT
properties.description: Path template for tenant files. Supports placeholders like {tenantName}.

properties.name: app.storage.templates.BUILDING
properties.description: Path template for building files. Supports placeholders like {buildingLocation}, {buildingName}.

properties.name: app.storage.templates.ROOM
properties.description: Path template for room files. Supports placeholders like {buildingLocation}, {buildingName}, {roomName}.

properties.name: app.storage.templates.RENTAL_SPACE
properties.description: Path template for rental space files. Supports placeholders like {buildingLocation}, {buildingName}, {roomName}.

properties.name: app.storage.templates.EMAIL_DATA
properties.description: Path template for email data files. Supports placeholder {emailThreadKey}.

properties.name: app.storage.templates.BUILDING_LOCATION
properties.description: Path template for building location files. Supports placeholder {buildingLocation}.

properties.name: app.storage.templates.FIRM
properties.description: Path template for firm files. Supports placeholder {firmName}.

properties.name: app.storage.templates.CAR
properties.description: Path template for car files. Supports placeholder {licensePlate}.

properties.name: app.storage.templates.OTHER
properties.description: Path template for other files. Supports placeholders {ownerType}, {ownerId}.

properties.name: app.excel.location.columns.locationType
properties.description: Excel column name for location type.

properties.name: app.excel.location.columns.name
properties.description: Excel column name for location name.

properties.name: app.excel.location.columns.officialName
properties.description: Excel column name for official location name.

properties.name: app.excel.location.columns.buildingLocation
properties.description: Excel column name for building location.

properties.name: app.excel.location.columns.mp
properties.description: Excel column name for square meters.

properties.name: app.excel.location.columns.groundLevel
properties.description: Excel column name for ground level indicator.

properties.name: app.excel.location.columns.buildingName
properties.description: Excel column name for building name.
